諗住聽日自己去橡樹谷滑雪
如題，有冇人join
不了
我都係首爾 岩岩到

quote.msg: 我都係首爾 岩岩到

replies.msg: 真心救教，韓國雪質唔係冇咁好咩？

quote.msg: 我都係首爾 岩岩到

replies.msg: I'm making preparations for my ski trip to Seoul. I'm also making preparations to meet my favourite band X Japan in Seoul so I'm preoccupied with these preparations. Preparations are being made for next month's ski festival in Seoul. The organisations and the institutions who organise it have announced that preparations for it are under way. My favourite boxer Dan will be fighting Oscar next month for the lightweight title. A championship like this requires proper preparation. The poster and the promo video are in preparation. Dan is doing thorough preparation for this match as he didn't perform well in his last fight because he did very little preparation. Oscar didn't seem to have done much preparation for his last fight too. He almost lost it so this time he's doing meticulous preparation for it including kickboxing, judo and wrestling as well as strength and conditioning training. Sparring regularly is ideal preparation for it. You cannot fight a high level boxer without adequate preparation. My favourite NBA team Bulls will be playing against Suns in April during the playoff season. A game like this needs adequate preparation. The poster, banners and the promo videos are in preparation. The players in Bulls are doing careful preparation for it as they didn't perform well in their last four games because they did no preparation. The players in Suns didn't seem to have done much preparation for their last match too. They almost lost it so this time they're doing thorough preparation for it including dunking, stealing, three point shooting, getting rebounds and blocking as well as cardio training. Training at least six hours a day is good preparation for it. You cannot play against a high level team without proper preparation.
真心救教，韓國雪質唔係冇咁好咩？
